panels.visual: Crowd gathered in courtyard Lunara at center with Yule Tree All five heroes visible in crowd
panels.dialogue: Announcer: "Citizens of Everpeak! The Yule Tree Ceremony begins!"

characters.Lunara: High elf druid, Circle of the Moon. 5'8" tall, graceful lithe athletic build. Long flowing chestnut brown hair with flowers woven in. Vibrant green eyes reflecting forest depths. Fair skin with slight tan. Classical elven beauty, pointed ears, serene expression. Practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns. Living vines and small flowers woven into clothing. Wooden staff carved with natural patterns. Bare feet or simple leather sandals.
characters.Val: Brass dragonborn monk, early 20s appearance. Just under 7 feet tall, lean athletic build with wiry monk strength. Warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen. Ember-glow orange eyes, bright and expressive. Reptilian face with kind open expression, shorter snout. Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) with chalk dust marks. Bare clawed feet. Prayer beads around wrist. Always in motion, expressive hand gestures.
characters.Prismor: Blue crystal dragonborn paladin, middle-aged. 7 feet tall, imposing presence, muscular powerful warrior's physique. Crystalline blue scales with hints of green, gem-like quality. Deep sapphire blue eyes, wise and contemplative. Noble dignified reptilian features. Plate armor with crystalline accents, Oath of the Ancients symbols (leaves, vines) etched in armor. Greatsword on back. Forest green cape. Perfect military posture.
characters.Apocalypse Winter: Human wizard, early 20s. 5'10" tall, strong but scholarly build. Dark hair, somewhat unkempt from library hours. Keen blue eyes, intelligent and curious. Pale skin from indoor studying. Determined jawline. Practical wizard robes in deep blue with silver trim. Leather satchel stuffed with scrolls. Component pouch. Ink-stained fingers. Reading glasses.
characters.Malrik: Drow rogue, young adult. 5'6" tall, slim agile acrobat's build. Dark gray-blue drow skin. White hair kept short and practical. Pale lavender eyes, sharp and observant. Sharp cheekbones, mischievous smile. Dark leather armor, well-maintained. Street performer's colorful vest underneath. Multiple hidden pockets. Deck of cards visible. Quick fluid movements.

npcs.Fantasy Crowd: Diverse medieval fantasy crowd - various fantasy races including high elves in elegant robes, stout dwarves in winter furs and chainmail, humans in colorful medieval festival attire, halflings in practical traveling clothes, a few dragonborn in ceremonial garb. Winter cloaks, fur trim, festival ribbons and decorations. Excited expressions, pointing at ceremony. NO modern clothing, NO suits or ties.

panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Grand Courtyard of Everpeak Citadel - massive open plaza carved from white stone, surrounded by towering crystalline spires reaching skyward. Ancient high elven architecture with elegant columns and arches. Winter setting with snow on ground and decorative festival banners, magical lanterns, ribbons in bright colors. Snow-capped mountain peaks visible in background. Clear winter sky. Center of courtyard prepared for Yule Tree ceremony with circular ritual space.

Characters:
- Lunara (center, focal point): High elf druid, 5'8", graceful athletic build, long flowing chestnut brown hair with flowers woven in, vibrant green eyes, fair skin, pointed ears, serene expression, practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns, living vines and flowers woven into clothing, wooden staff with natural patterns, bare feet, fluid graceful movements
- Val (visible in crowd): Brass dragonborn monk, just under 7 feet, lean athletic build, warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen, ember-glow orange eyes, kind reptilian expression, simple earth-tone monastery robes with chalk dust, bare clawed feet, prayer beads on wrist
- Prismor (visible in crowd): Blue crystal dragonborn paladin, 7 feet tall, imposing muscular build, crystalline blue-green scales (gem-like), deep sapphire eyes, noble bearing, plate armor with nature symbols, forest green cape, greatsword on back
- Apocalypse Winter (visible in crowd): Human wizard, early 20s, 5'10", strong scholarly build, dark unkempt hair, keen blue eyes, pale skin, deep blue robes with silver trim, leather satchel, reading glasses, ink-stained fingers
- Malrik (visible in crowd): Drow rogue, 5'6", slim agile build, dark gray-blue skin, white short hair, pale lavender eyes, sharp features, dark leather armor, colorful vest, cards visible, mischievous smile

Crowd/NPCs: Large diverse medieval fantasy crowd - high elves in elegant robes, stout dwarves in winter furs and chainmail, humans in colorful medieval festival clothing, halflings in traveling clothes, dragonborn in ceremonial garb. Winter cloaks, fur trim, festival decorations. Excited expressions watching ceremony. NO modern clothing.

Scene: Large establishing shot of the Yule Tree ceremony beginning. Lunara stands at center of circular ritual space in the grand courtyard, magical green energy beginning to glow around her hands. Massive Yule Tree (30+ feet tall, majestic pine) positioned in center ready to be planted. All five heroes visible at different points in the surrounding crowd. Crowd gathered in semicircle watching with anticipation. Winter festival atmosphere with decorations and magical lighting. Dramatic composition showing scale of citadel and ceremony.

Dialogue: Announcer (off-panel or crowd member): "Citizens of Everpeak! The Yule Tree Ceremony begins!"

Include speech bubble with dialogue text clearly readable.

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality. Epic establishing shot with sense of scale and ceremony.

panels.visual: Close on Lunara's face, concentrating Green energy swirling around her hands
panels.dialogue: Lunara: "By root and branch, by earth and stone, let this tree find its home..."

Professional comic book panel illustration.

Characters:
- Lunara: High elf druid, 5'8", graceful athletic build, long flowing chestnut brown hair with flowers woven in, vibrant green eyes reflecting forest depths, fair skin with slight tan, pointed ears, serene but focused expression, practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns, living vines and flowers woven into clothing, wooden staff

panels.visual: Tree's roots entering ground But - magical resistance visible as crackling energy **Sound EFFECTS:** "KRRZZZT"
panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Grand Courtyard of Everpeak Citadel, ground level view. Winter setting with snow-covered stone plaza.

Scene: Dynamic action shot focused on the massive Yule Tree's root system as it enters the ground. Thick, gnarled tree roots (glowing with green druidic magic) pushing down into the white stone and snow of the courtyard plaza. BUT - violent magical resistance visible as crackling red and orange energy sparking and arcing from the ground where roots meet stone. Reality seems to distort and fight against the tree's placement. Chunks of stone and snow flying up from impact. Green nature magic (from Lunara's spell) clashing with angry red resistance energy. Dramatic tension between two magical forces. Ground cracking and breaking. Winter debris (snow, ice, stone fragments) thrown into air.

Sound Effects: Large bold "KRRZZZT" showing the crackling electrical-like resistance energy.

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality. High energy action panel with dramatic magical effects and motion.

panels.visual: Verdant essence taking visible form - angry nature elemental Crowd gasping **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOOSH"

npcs.Fantasy Crowd: Diverse medieval fantasy crowd in winter festival attire - high elves in elegant robes and cloaks, stout dwarves in heavy furs and chainmail, humans in colorful medieval clothing with winter cloaks, halflings in practical traveling clothes, dragonborn in ceremonial fantasy garb. All showing shocked gasping expressions, pointing and recoiling in fear. NO modern clothing, NO business suits, NO ties.

creatures.Verdant Mephit: Small angry nature elemental, 2-3 feet tall. Body composed of living vines and thorny brambles twisted into vaguely humanoid shape. Glowing green pinpoint eyes filled with rage. Twisted roots and thorns forming limbs and torso. Leaf-like wings rustling aggressively. Aura of wild garden scent mixed with decay. Trail of thorny vines and moss spreading where it moves. Garden debris (leaves, petals, thorns) swirling around it in angry vortex. Manifesting from corrupted nature essence - wrong, twisted, unnatural corruption of natural magic.

panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Grand Courtyard of Everpeak Citadel during Yule Tree ceremony. Winter festival setting.

Creatures:
- Verdant Mephit (center, dramatic reveal): Small angry nature elemental, 2-3 feet tall, body composed of living vines and thorny brambles twisted into vaguely humanoid shape, glowing green pinpoint eyes filled with rage, twisted roots and thorns forming limbs, leaf-like wings rustling aggressively, wild garden scent aura, trail of thorny vines and moss, garden debris (leaves, petals, thorns) swirling around it in angry vortex, corrupted nature essence manifestation, wrong and unnatural

Crowd/NPCs: Medieval fantasy crowd recoiling in shock and fear - high elves in elegant robes gasping, stout dwarves in heavy furs and chainmail backing away, humans in colorful medieval festival clothing with winter cloaks showing frightened expressions, halflings in practical traveling clothes pointing in alarm, dragonborn in ceremonial fantasy garb with shocked faces. All medieval fantasy attire, NO modern business clothing.

Scene: Dramatic reveal as the corrupted Verdant Essence suddenly takes visible physical form, erupting from the ground near the tree. The Verdant Mephit materializes in explosion of green energy, thorny vines, and nature debris. Crowd visible in background and sides, all gasping and recoiling in shock and fear. Some pointing, some stepping back, children hiding behind parents. Wind and energy radiating outward from the mephit's manifestation. Green magical energy crackling. Debris and leaves swirling dramatically. Moment of horror and surprise.

Sound Effects: Large bold "WHOOOSH" showing the explosive manifestation of the elemental.

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality. Dramatic creature reveal with high energy and crowd reaction.
